name: 5th World Congress on Disaster Managment
content: WCDM-2020 is being organised jointly by the Government of National Capital Territory (GNCT) of Delhi, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi and Disaster Management Initiatives and Convergence Society (DMICS) Hyderabad in collaboration with National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) and National Institute of Disaster Management (NIDM).
